metadata.title: Humanize AI Pro | 11-in-1 AI Toolkit
metadata.description: The ultimate suite to humanize AI text, bypass detectors, generate SEO articles, check for plagiarism, and more. All in one place.

mainContent.welcomeTitle: Humanize AI, SEO, and Create Content
mainContent.verificationSuiteDescription: Ensure your content is original and error-free with our AI Detector and Plagiarism Checker.
mainContent.seoSuiteDescription: Boost your search engine ranking with our suite of SEO tools.

humanizerTab.placeholder: Place your AI-generated text here, and we will work our magic to make it completely human-like.
humanizerTab.outputPlaceholder: Your humanized text will appear here.

articleForgeTab.title: Article Forge
articleForgeTab.description: Generate high-quality, SEO-optimized articles on any topic in seconds.
articleForgeTab.settingsDescription: Customize the generation parameters for your article.
articleForgeTab.topicPlaceholder: e.g., The future of AI in marketing
articleForgeTab.outputDescription: Your article is ready. You can now copy or download it.
articleForgeTab.outputPlaceholder: Your generated article will appear here.

aiDetectorTab.title: AI Content Detector
aiDetectorTab.description: Scan your text to see how likely it is to be detected as AI-generated.
aiDetectorTab.placeholder: Paste your text here (minimum 100 words) to check for AI content.
aiDetectorTab.resultsPlaceholder: Your AI detection results will appear here.
aiDetectorTab.analyzing: Analyzing your text with multiple detection engines...

advice.good: Your text is very likely to be seen as human-written. Great job!
advice.medium: Your text has some AI-like patterns. Consider using our Humanizer Tool to improve it.
advice.bad: Your text is highly likely to be detected as AI. We strongly recommend using our Humanizer Tool to rewrite it.

plagiarismCheckerTab.title: Plagiarism Checker
plagiarismCheckerTab.description: Ensure your content is 100% original before publishing.
plagiarismCheckerTab.placeholder: Paste your text here to check for plagiarism against billions of sources.
plagiarismCheckerTab.resultsPlaceholder: Your plagiarism check results will appear here.

seoContent.title: Why is Humanizing AI Content Important for SEO?
seoContent.description: Google's updates prioritize high-quality, human-centric content. AI-generated text often lacks the nuance, authority, and trustworthiness that search engines now reward. Humanizing your content is no longer optionalâ€”it's essential for ranking.
seoContent.feature1Description: AI-like text can be flagged as spammy or low-quality, hurting your site's credibility and search rankings.
seoContent.feature2Description: Human-like content resonates better with readers, leading to lower bounce rates and higher time on page.
seoContent.feature3Description: Authentic, well-written content establishes your site as a trusted source of information in your niche.

seoToolsTab.mainDescription: A collection of powerful tools to optimize your content for search engines and improve your rankings.
seoToolsTab.metaGeneratorDescription: Create SEO-friendly titles and descriptions for your pages.
seoToolsTab.metaGeneratorContentPlaceholder: Paste your article or page content here...
seoToolsTab.headerGeneratorDescription: Add structured H1, H2, and H3 tags to your content.
seoToolsTab.lsiIntegratorDescription: Seamlessly integrate Latent Semantic Indexing keywords into your text.
seoToolsTab.lsiIntegratorKeywordsPlaceholder: e.g., digital marketing, content strategy, SEO tools

grammarCheckerTab.title: AI Grammar Checker
grammarCheckerTab.description: Correct grammar, spelling, and punctuation mistakes in your text instantly. Ensure your writing is polished and professional.
grammarCheckerTab.cardDescription: Paste your content below and let our AI fix any errors.
grammarCheckerTab.placeholder: Start writing or paste your text here...

documentAnalyzerTab.title: Document Analyzer
documentAnalyzerTab.description: Upload a PDF and interact with it. Get summaries, translations, and answers to your questions instantly.
documentAnalyzerTab.uploadDescription: or click to browse your files
documentAnalyzerTab.uploadSuccessDescription: Your document '{fileName}' has been uploaded. What would you like to do next?
documentAnalyzerTab.chatPlaceholder: Ask a question about your document...
documentAnalyzerTab.mindMapPlaceholder: Your mind map will appear here.

citationGeneratorTab.title: AI Citation Generator
citationGeneratorTab.description: Automatically generate citations in APA, MLA, Chicago, and more formats from a URL or text.
citationGeneratorTab.card1Description: Enter a URL or paste text to extract citation details.
citationGeneratorTab.textPlaceholder: Paste the text of your source here...
citationGeneratorTab.card2Description: Our AI has extracted the following. Please verify and edit if needed.
citationGeneratorTab.card3Description: Select your desired style and copy the formatted citation.
citationGeneratorTab.finalCitationPlaceholder: Your final citation will appear here...

aiTranslatorTab.title: AI Translator
aiTranslatorTab.description: Translate text between languages with contextual accuracy and tone adjustment. Powered by advanced AI models.

articleFormatterTab.title: AI Article Formatter
articleFormatterTab.description: Turn your messy draft into a well-structured, readable article with just one click. Adds headings, lists, and improves flow.
articleFormatterTab.card1Description: Provide your draft and the main goal of the article.
articleFormatterTab.draftPlaceholder: Paste your raw text, notes, or messy draft here...
articleFormatterTab.goalPlaceholder: e.g., Explain how to use an AI humanizer
articleFormatterTab.card2Description: Your structured and readable article is ready.
articleFormatterTab.outputPlaceholder: Your formatted article will appear here...

socialMediaExpertTab.title: AI Social Media Expert
socialMediaExpertTab.description: Generate engaging social media content for any platform. Provide a description and get titles, posts, hashtags, and more.
socialMediaExpertTab.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., A short video explaining the benefits of humanizing AI text for SEO.
socialMediaExpertTab.card2Description: Here are some AI-generated ideas for your content.
